certifications.title: Computer Communications by University of Colorado

projects.name: Project Management System
projects.description: Streamline project management for faculties and students, improved communication, and data-driven insights. Built with HTML, CSS, PHP, and SQL.

projects.name: Coffee Shop Portal
projects.description: Created a visually appealing and user-friendly interface using HTML and CSS to attract customers and provide a seamless browsing experience. Effectively highlighted coffee products, food items, and their unique attributes, help customers find their desired products quickly.

projects.name: Payment Gateway
projects.description: Developed a user-friendly frontend using HTML and CSS to replicate PayPal's core features like signup, login, and account management. Created essential pages such as 'About Us', 'Contact Us', and a dedicated section outlining fees and charges.

projects.name: Earthquake Prediction
projects.description: Historical earthquake data was collected and imported into a Pandas DataFrame for manipulation. The dataset was cleaned to handle missing values, inconsistencies, and outliers, ensuring data quality for modeling. Relevant features such as magnitude, location, depth, and time-related attributes were extracted or created from the raw data to serve as input for the model.

full_output.name: Aditi Singh Chauhan
achievements_and_awards: A and B certificate in NCC
